subject: Sexual Health
title: Erectile Dysfunction Only Affects Old Men Myth
description: A quick win: understand Erectile Dysfunction Only Affects Old Men Myth.

hook.text: Erectile dysfunction is not just an old man's problem. About 26% of men under 40 experience it.

buildup.text: Causes in younger men include performance anxiety, stress, depression, and excessive pornography use.

discovery.text: Physical causes like diabetes, obesity, and cardiovascular disease can cause ED at any adult age.

twist.text: ED in young men can actually be an early warning sign of heart disease, years before cardiac symptoms appear.

climax.text: Seeking help for ED at any age is important, both for sexual health and potentially for early disease detection.

punchline.text: Not just aging. A signal worth investigating at any age.

quiz.question: What percentage of men under 40 experience erectile dysfunction?
